00003 @implementation NSNumber (CreatingFromArbitraryTypes)
00004 + numberWithValue:(const void *)aValue objCType:(const char *)aTypeDescription;
00005 {
00006         return [[[self alloc] initWithValue:aValue objCType:aTypeDescription] autorelease];
00007 }
00008 
00010 - initWithValue:(const void *)aValue objCType:(const char *)aTypeDescription;
00011 {
00012         if ('^' == *aTypeDescription
00013                 && nil == *(id *)aValue) return nil; // nil should stay nil, even if it's technically a (void *)
00014         id number = [NSNumber alloc];
00015         switch (*aTypeDescription) 
00016         {
00017                 case 'c': // BOOL, char
00018                         return [number initWithChar:*(char *)aValue];
00019                 case 'C': return [number initWithUnsignedChar:*(unsigned char *)aValue];
00020                 case 's': return [number initWithShort:*(short *)aValue];
00021                 case 'S': return [number initWithUnsignedShort:*(unsigned short *)aValue];
00022                 case 'i': return [number initWithInt:*(int *)aValue];
00023                 case 'I': return [number initWithUnsignedInt:*(unsigned *)aValue];
00024                 case 'l': return [number initWithLong:*(long *)aValue];
00025                 case 'L': return [number initWithUnsignedLong:*(unsigned long *)aValue];
00026                 case 'q': return [number initWithLongLong:*(long long *)aValue];
00027                 case 'Q': return [number initWithUnsignedLongLong:*(unsigned long long *)aValue];
00028                 case 'f': return [number initWithFloat:*(float *)aValue];
00029                 case 'd': return [number initWithDouble:*(double *)aValue];
00030                 case '@': return *(id *)aValue;
00031                 case '^': // pointer, no string stuff supported right now
00032                 case '{': // struct, only simple ones containing only basic types right now
00033                 case '[': // array, of whatever, just gets the address
00034                         return [[NSValue alloc] initWithBytes:aValue objCType:aTypeDescription];
00035         }
00036 
00037         return [[NSValue alloc] initWithBytes:aValue objCType:aTypeDescription];        
00038 }
00039 @end
